blog.name: eve-and-villanelle
blog.title: I Feel Things When I'm With You
blog.description: Trinity // Lesbian // 17 // Killing Eve is taking over my life // I'm in love with Villanelle whoops // Let Villanelle watch movies with someone 2k19 // I'm a killing eve fan first and a human second // Please talk to me it'll make my day!!

summary: Villanelle getting scared by Julian's mom is still the best thing to ever happen skdjghskdjggasdg
question: Villanelle getting scared by Julian's mom is still the best thing to ever happen skdjghskdjggasdg
answer: Villanelle always acts like she’s tough shit™ (especially around Eve) but Julian’s mom literally almost scared her to death multiple times and I will never not laugh about it

tags: how does she have eyes like that
summary:
I have never seen a human being look more like a shark than Jodie Comer.
Captures the whole kind of wide-eyed “I might tear your...
body:
I have never seen a human being look more like a shark than Jodie Comer.

Captures the whole kind of wide-eyed “I might tear your leg off but it’s just what I am,” kind of thing.

blog.name: serpentcast
blog.title: Be the Serpent
blog.description: Three redheaded Slytherinish fantasy authors (Alexandra Rowland, Freya Marske, and Jennifer Mace) talking about serious works of deep literary merit. Episodes air every other Wednesday! (Hugo Awards finalist 2019)

summary: Episode 37: Emotions Are Hard, Let's Do Murder!
title: Episode 37: Emotions Are Hard, Let's Do Murder!
excerpt:
On this week's episode, we're discussing ASSASSINS! Tentpoles this week are The Perfect Assassin by K.A. Doore, the television show Killing Eve, and the movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith. What We’re Into Lately
The Calculating Stars by Mary Robinette Kowal
The H...
description:
On this week’s episode, we’re discussing ASSASSINS! Tentpoles this week are The Perfect Assassin by K.A. Doore, the television show Killing Eve, and the movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith.

What We’re Into Lately

The Calculating Stars by Mary Robinette Kowal
The Hating Game by Sally Thorne
A Duke in Disguise by Cat Sebastian
Gideon the Ninth by Tamsyn Muir
The Fisherman by John Langan
Ship of Smoke and Steel by Django Wexler
Killing Eve
Proper English by K.J. Charles
Salt: A World History by Mark Kurlansky
“Episode 10: Spies & Disguise” from Technique Critique
HIStory 3: Trapped

Other Stuff We Mentioned

Think of England by K.J. Charles
“meditations ex post facto” by singlecrow
A Choir of Lies by Alexandra Rowland
A Conspiracy of Truths by Alexandra Rowland
Freya’s amazing new jacket
Ozimandais by Percy Bysshe Shelley
Scandal
House
Mr. Right
Pitch Perfect
The Bourne series
Zoolander
John le Carré
Grosse Pointe Blank
Person of Interest
Farseer by Robin Hobbe
BtS patreon
Naruto
Dreaming of Sunshine
Discworld
Anne McCaffrey

For Next Time

The entire slate of Best Novels from this year’s Hugo Award ballot!

Transcript

The transcript for this episode is available here. The scribes are amazing! They’re so good!! Yay for scribes!!!

summary:
Eve Polastri: you’re under arrest!
Villanelle: what am I being charged with?
Eve: stealing my heart. 
Villanelle: awww 
Eve: and...
body:
Eve Polastri: you’re under arrest!

Villanelle: what am I being charged with?

Eve: stealing my heart.

Villanelle: awww

Eve: and several counts of first degree murder

Me: Yes! It is amazing.

body:
Mech prin lecturer: *to the whole class* Have you heard of Killing Eve?

Me: Yes! It is amazing.

Mech prin lecturer: yeah I watched the first episode. It was pretty good. My mate revommended it

Me: You’re mate knows good tv
